title: conferred on me by section 320 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Defence Act 1954 (Part XIII)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Defence Act 1954 (Part XIII) 

(Establishment Day) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited defence act 1954 (part xiii) (establishment day) order 2024

title: conferred on me by section 320 of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954),
heading: 2. The 1st day of December 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of December 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day 

for the purposes of Part XIII of the Defence Act 1954 (No. 18 of 1954). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 November, 2024. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Minister for Defence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [619] 3
